songs.title: ブルー (Azul -Jap)
songs.lyrics:
(Verse 1)
Nee kimi ga o tona ni natemo
Issho ni atarashi mono mireru kana
Chu-zeni noru youna
Gemu no youna sosomoteki
Na youna koto
Okitara do

(Chorus)
Kimi to boku
Higai no dare ga miena i
Mono shinjiru
Baro kimini
Tsunaitai
Uh!

(Verse 2)
Bokura wa hekonde
Toki ni oide gebori muda
Ni mune wa
Sa wa i de shimao

Otona ni ga teemo
Shijitsuzuke rareru karu
Nashinji e wa
Mieru hazu sonsai

(Chorus)
Kimi to boku
Higai no dare ga miena i
Mono shinjiru
Baro kimini
Tsunaitai

Kimi to boku
Higai no dare ga miena i
Mono kanjiru
Baro kimini
Tsunaitai
Uh!

(Outro)
Azul
Azul
Azul
Kanji
Kanji
Kanji
Zenbu kanjiteru (x3)

Ao
Ao
Azul
Kanji
Kanji
Kanji
